price: چې هيڅ شريك نه لري، او په همدې راته امر شوى او زه د مسلمانانو اول كس يم.
arabic: لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُۥۖ وَبِذَٰلِكَ أُمِرۡتُ وَأَنَا۠ أَوَّلُ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: lā sharīka lahu wabidhālika umir'tu wa-anā awwalu al-mus'limīna
